divs: Sighting DetailsCabo San Lucas, BC, Mexico. 2300hrs sitting on balcony of hotel facing towards the southeast.Noticed 3 bright orange objects flying at first in a triangle formation accross the sky then made a vertical turn and disapeared.Another single object then 3 or 4 then a couple of singles, this went on for several minutes all doing the same thing as the first 3, all disapearing in the same manner. They did not appear to be airplanes because no navigation lights were seen.The color of the objects were star like and a bright orange.I have observed many type of aircraft military and civilian and have never seen anything fly at that speed and make course changes so severe.I estimate a total of 10-12 objects seen, then disapeared.Watched sky for another 10 minutes or so nothing else seen. I hope someone else besides my wife and myself saw this and can explain.Very interesting.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Cabo San Lucas
There were no other sightings in Cabo San Lucas on or around October 9th 2010
Summary: orange bright light approx 10-12 objects flying in a irreagular formation.
